#summary How to.

This function returns the number of items you have in your cache. Pass in the `category` argument to only return the count items of a specific type (action, partial etc).

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| category || no || string || || "action", "partial" or "query" ||

*Examples:*

{{{
<cfset count = cacheCount()>
}}}

{{{
<cfset count = cacheCount("query")>
}}}

See the section on [Caching] for more information and code examples.
